subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Inventor
entries: A nivell 2, tens competència amb two tools (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Casting
entries: A nivell 6, you learn to channel magic through your arcanomechanical armor to augment spells in a variety of ways. When you cast a spell while wearing that armor and attuned to it, you can expend one additional spell slot of 1st or 2nd level to alter the spell. The effect depends on the spell slot you expend.

A 1st-level slot allows you to manipulate the spell's energy. When you cast a spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can substitute that damage type for another one from that list.

A 2nd-level slot increases the spell's raw force. If you roll damage for the spell when you cast it, increase that damage by {@damage 2d10} de dany de força against one of the spell's targets (escull) this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Prodigious Inspiration
entries: A nivell 10, you have attained a greater mastery of spell preparation. Com a acció bonus, you can replace one spell you have prepared with another spell from your spellbook. You can't use this ability again fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Caos sota Control
entries: A nivell 14, your ability to improvise magic grows stronger. Whenever you roll on a Reckless Casting table for a spell other than a cantrip, you can roll on the table that is one level higher than the expended spell slot.

subclassFeature.name: Lore Mastery
entries: Lore Mastery is an tradició arcana fixated on understanding the underlying mechanics of magic. It is the most academic of all tradicions arcanes. The promise of uncovering new knowledge or proving (or discrediting) a theory of magic is usually required to rouse its practitioners from their laboratories, academies, and archives to pursue a life of adventure.

Known as savants, followers of this tradition are a bookish lot who see beauty and mystery in the application of magic. The results of a spell are less interesting to them than the process that creates it. Some savants take a haughty attitude toward those who follow a tradition focused on a single school of magic, seeing them as provincial and lacking the sophistication needed to master true magic. Other savants are generous teachers, countering ignorance and deception with deep knowledge and good humor.

subclassFeature.name: Altering Spells
entries: While the Spell Secrets feature offers increased versatility, at the table its effects can be difficult to spot by the other players. If you're playing a savant, take a moment to describe how you alter your spells. Think of a signature change your character is particularly proud of. Be inventive, and make the game more fun for everyone by playing up the sudden, unexpected tricks you character can employ. For example, a {@spell bola de foc} transformed to require a Força save might become a sphere of burning rock that shatters and slams into its target. A {@spell fascinar persona} that requires a Constitució save might take the form of a vaporous narcotic that alters the target's mood.

subclassFeature.name: Lore Master
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you become a compendium of knowledge on a vast array of topics. El teu bonus de competència is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Història}, {@skill Naturalesa}, or {@skill Religió} if you are proficient in that skill.

A més, your analytical abilities are so well-honed that your initiative in combat can be driven by mental agility, rather than physical agility. Quan tires per iniciativa, it is either an Intel·ligència check or a Destresa check for you (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Spell Secrets
entries: A nivell 2, you master the first in a series of arcane secrets uncovered by your extensive studies.

When you cast a spell with a spell slot and the spell deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, you can substitute that damage type with one other type from that list (you can change only one damage type per casting of a spell). You replace one energy type for another by altering the spell's formula as you cast it.

When you cast a spell with a spell slot and the spell requires a saving throw, you can change the saving throw from one ability score to another (escull). Once you change a saving throw in this way, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Casting
entries: A nivell 6, you learn to augment spells in a variety of ways. When you cast a spell with a spell slot, you can expend one additional spell slot to augment its effects for this casting, mixing the raw stuff of magic into your spell to amplify it. The effect depends on the spell slot you expend.

An additional 1st-level spell slot can increase the spell's raw force. If you roll damage for the spell when you cast it, increase the damage against every target by {@damage 2d10} de dany de força. If the spell can deal damage on more than one turn, it deals this extra force damage only on the turn you cast the spell.
An additional 2nd-level spell slot can increase the spell's range. If the spell's range is at least 30 feet, it becomes 1 mile.
An additional 3rd-level spell slot can increase the spell's potency. Increase the spell's save DC by 2.

subclassFeature.name: Prodigious Memory
entries: A nivell 10, you have attained a greater mastery of spell preparation. Com a acció bonus, you can replace one spell you have prepared with another spell from your spellbook. No pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Magic
entries: A nivell 14, your knowledge of magic allows you to duplicate almost any spell. Com a acció bonus, you can call to mind the ability to cast one spell (escull) from any class's spell list. The spell must be of a level for which you have ranures de conjur, you mustn't have it prepared, and you follow the normal rules for casting it, including expending a spell slot. If the spell isn't a wizard spell, it counts as a wizard spell when you cast it. The ability to cast the spell vanishes from your mind when you cast it or when the current turn ends.
No pots tornar a emprar aquest tret fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Theurgy
entries: A number of deities claim arcane magic as their domain, for magic is as much a part of the fabric of the cosmos as wind, fire, lightning, and all other primal forces. Just as there are deities of the sea and gods of warfare, the arcane arts feature their own divine patrons.

Such deities often have clerics, but many gods of magic bid their followers to take up the study of wizardry. These religious magic-users follow the tradició arcana of Theurgy, and are commonly known as theurgists. Such spellcasters are as dedicated and scholarly as any other wizard, but they blend their arcane study with religious devotion.

subclassFeature.name: Iniciació Arcana
entries: Beginning when you select this tradition a nivell 2, whenever you gain a wizard level, you can replace one of the wizard spells you add to your spellbook with a cleric domain spell for your chosen domain. The spell must be of a level for which you have ranures de conjur.

If you add all of your conjurs de domini to your spellbook, you can subsequently add any spell de la llista de conjurs de clergue instead. The spell must still be of a level for which you have ranures de conjur.
Any cleric spell you gain from this feature is considered a wizard spell for you, but other wizards can't copy cleric spells from your spellbook into their own spellbooks.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Arcana
entries: A nivell 2, you gain the ability to channel arcane energy directly from your deity, using that energy to fuel magical effects. You start with two such effects: Divine Arcana and the Canalitzar Divinitat option granted a nivell 2 by your chosen domain. You employ that Canalitzar Divinitat option by using your Channel Arcana ability.
When you use your Channel Arcana, you choose which effect to create. You must then finish a short or long rest to use your Channel Arcana again.
Some Channel Arcana effects require saving throws. When you use such an effect, the save DC equals your wizard spell save DC.

Començant a nivell 6, you can use your Channel Arcana twice between rests, and començant a nivell 18, you can use it three times between rests. Quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg, en recuperes tots els usos.
If you gain additional Canalitzar Divinitat options from your domain, you can employ them by using your Channel Arcana feature.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Arcana: Divine Arcana
entries: Com a acció bonus, you speak a prayer to control the flow of magic around you. The next spell you cast gains a +2 bonus to any attack roll you make for it or to its saving throw DC, as appropriate.

subclassFeature.name: Divine Inspiration
entries: Quan esculls aquesta tradició a nivell 2, choose a domain from your chosen deity's list of eligible domains (see appendix B, "Gods of the Multiverse," in the Player's Handbook for examples). The Knowledge and Light domains are especially appropriate choices for a theurgist.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Acolyte
entries: A nivell 6, you gain your chosen domain's 1st-level benefits. However, you do not gain any weapon or armor proficiencies from the domain.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Priest
entries: A nivell 10, you gain your chosen domain's 6th-level benefits. Your faith and your understanding of magic allow you to delve into your god's secrets.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane High Priest
entries: A nivell 14, you gain your chosen domain's 17th-level benefits. Your academic nature and understanding of magic and doctrine allow you to master this ability sooner than a cleric of your domain.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia de Guerra
entries: A variety of arcane colleges specialize in training wizards for war. The tradition of Màgia de Guerra blends principles of evocation and abjuration. It teaches techniques that empower a caster's spells, while also providing methods for a wizard to bolster their own defenses.

Followers of this tradition are known as mag de guerras. They see their magic as both a weapon and armor, a resource superior to any flimsy piece of steel. Mag de Guerras strike fast in battle, using their spells to seize tactical control of a situation. Their spells strike hard, while their defensive skills foil their opponents' attempts to counterattack.

subclassFeature.name: Desviament Arcà
entries: A nivell 2, you have learned to weave your magic to fortify yourself against harm. When you are hit by an attack or fail a Constitució saving throw, pots, com a reacció, gain a +2 bonus to your AC against that attack or a +4 bonus to that saving throw.
When you use this feature, you can't cast spells other than cantrips fins el final del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Astúcia Tàctica
entries: Començant a nivell 2, your ability to quickly assess tactical situations allows you to act quickly in battle. You gain a bonus to your initiative rolls equivalent al teu modificador d'Intel·ligència.

subclassFeature.name: Esclat d'Energia
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you can empower your spells that unleash harm on groups of foes. When you force multiple creatures to make saving throws against the damage of one of your spells, you can increase the spell's damage by rolling two more of its damage dice. This increase occurs only on the turn you cast the spell.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia Duradora
entries: Començant a nivell 10, the magic you channel helps ward off harm. While you maintain concentration on a spell, you have a +2 bonus to AC and all saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia Duradora
entries: A nivell 14, your Desviament Arcà becomes infused with deadly magic. Quan empris el tret Desviament Arcà, magical energy arcs from you; tota criatura que designis a 10 peus de tu takes force damage equal to la meitat del teu nivell de mag.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia de Guerra
entries: A variety of arcane colleges specialize in training wizards for war. The tradition of Màgia de Guerra blends principles of evocation and abjuration, rather than specializing in either of those schools. It teaches techniques that empower a caster's spells, while also providing methods for wizards to bolster their own defenses.

Followers of this tradition are known as mag de guerras. They see their magic as both a weapon and armor, a resource superior to any piece of steel. Mag de Guerras act fast in battle, using their spells to seize tactical control of a situation. Their spells strike hard, while their defensive skills foil their opponents' attempts to counterattack. Mag de Guerras are also adept at turning other spellcasters' magical energy against them.

In great battles, a mag de guerra often works with evokers, abjurers, and other types of wizards. Evokers, in particular, sometimes tease mag de guerras for splitting their attention between offense and defense. A mag de guerra's typical response: "What good is being able to throw a mighty {@spell bola de foc} if I die before I can cast it?"

subclassFeature.name: Desviament Arcà
entries: A nivell 2, aprèns a teixir màgia defensiva per a evitar dany. Quan t'impacten amb un atac o quan falles una salvada pots, com a reacció, sumar +2 a la CA per aquell atac o +4 a aquella salvada.
Quan empres aquest tret, no pots llançar conjurs fins el final del teu proper torn (pots llançar trucs).

subclassFeature.name: Astúcia Tàctica
entries: Començant a nivell 2, les teves habilitats estratègiques et permeten actuar ràpidament. Pots sumar el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència a les teves tirades d'Iniciativa.

subclassFeature.name: Esclat d'Energia
entries: Començant a nivell 6, pots emmagatzemar energia màgica dins teu per a empoderar conjurs posteriors. Aquesta energia guardada s'anonmena un esclat d'energia.

Pots emmagatzemar tans esclats com el teu modificador d'Intel·ligència (mínim d'1). Quan acabes un Descans Llarg, perds els esclats emmagatzemats. Quan acabes o interromps un conjur amb els conjurs {@spell dissipar màgia} o {@spell contraconjur}, emmagatzemes un esclat d'energia, ja que robes l'energia màgica que has interromput. Si acabes un Descans Curt i no tens esclats d'energia, en reps 1.
Un cop per torn quan causes dany a una criatura o objecte amb un conjur de mag, pots gastar un esclat d'energia; llavors sumaràs la meitat del teu nivell de mag al dany.

subclassFeature.name: Màgia Duradora
entries: Començant a nivell 10, la màgia que canalitzes et guareix del perill. Mentre t'estàs concentrant en un conjur, sumes +2 a la CA i a qualsevol salvada.

subclassFeature.name: Mantell Desviador
entries: A nivell 14, el teu Desviament Arcà s'impregna de màgia mortífera. Quan empris el tret Desviament Arcà, pots fer que es dispari màgia de tu. Fins a 3 criatures (escull) que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu reben la meitat del teu nivell de mag de dany de força.
